name: sugarloaf mittens
sizes_available: toddler, child, teen/small adult, large adult

the sugarloaf mittens are a no sew, one piece pattern, with an easy skill level! they can be made in one solid color, color blocks as shown, or stripes! they would also look great in a self striping yarn!
